description: For three generations, Van Rijk has established itself as a trusted brick and mortar store dedicated to providing clients with the highest quality merchandise, value and customer service. With over 30 years of experience in the industry, Mr. Van Rijk has built up an extensive inventory of previously-owned fine contemporary timepieces and jewellery as well as a large collection of vintage pieces that display charm, history and craftsmanship. An ‘Aladdin’s Cave’ of inventory ensures that there will be something for everyone – both buying and selling. Van Rijk strives to maintain our fundamental business principles of providing our customers with the professionalism, trust and expertise that they deserve, whether buying, selling or trading their jewellery and watches. Both in store and online, the level of customer service that staff prides itself on is guaranteed to result in a memorable, positive experience for the customer. The history behind your family heirloom is special and unique; our mission is to convey that feeling and let others enjoy the piece as much as you have. WE ARE EXPERTS Our collective experience and ability to accurately price pieces instills confidence of the true value. Each member of our team is highly skilled in determining market value, sales, and industry standards. We strive to give you the best price and service by demonstrating our unmatched knowledge of the industry. WE ARE HONEST Our reputation is what sets us apart from our competition. In order for you to feel good about your experience and recommend us to your peers, we walk you through how we arrived at our valuation so you are confident you are getting the best price possible for your heirlooms and vintage pieces. This way you will see that we are fair, honest and transparent. WE UNDERSTAND FAMILY VALUES Three generations of our family has taken pride in the Van Rijk name. Tradition and legacy is what has gotten us to where we are. Every piece has a deep history to it. We respect the desire to have your family heirlooms treated with care and to see their heritage and importance alive and treasured. Let our family help you realize the potential of your pre-owned pieces. WE ARE PASSIONATE We are driven to succeed everyday because this is our family’s passion. We strive to give you the best experience possible to ensure you see us as the only place to buy, sell, or trade your precious estate jewellery and watches. Earning and maintaining the respect and trust of our customers is essential to the continued success that we have received.

reviews.title: fantastic
text: I had a fantastic experience with my internet purchase.
Alec and Barbara were beyond polite and patient with my endless questions.
The piece that I purchased is gorgeous and in pristine condition, just as promised.
I will be a customer for life.

reviews.title: Helpful Info for those considering Selling their Pieces
text: Vast selection of high valued products. Secure facility. Polite. Knowledgeable. Based upon other reviews, buying from their existing supply may be a good option.  I was not there to buy so cannot personally comment on this part of their offering.
The possible selling option (asking them to buy what I had) was not what I had anticipated.
I share my experience with you to help others have a more informed approach.
Alec explained to me that the “product” (the item as it was presented, based upon my selection of pieces) was not what was being valued.

Stones (diamonds, emeralds, topaz, sapphires, etc.) would be removed from the setting (nominal value, if anything) and then the gold melted down to be reused.  Product settings, approximately 10-15 years old, were advised to be outdated.  Some were bulk shopping and therefore not valued as named items may have been.

The pieces were inspected – including the stones - then everything was gathered up and weighed together by type of metal.  The offer received was less than 10% of the current estimated retail value. While I had not expected anything close to retail (even stores cannot always sell for full 'retail'), I was significantly surprised by the percentage offered.  I learned a lot about “breakup value” which is something one does not learn when initially buying jewellery.

From a selling perspective – I am left with the understanding that unless heirloom or high-end, the product may be worth only a fraction of what one imagines.  I am in no way an expert in this field but am grateful for the lesson.
For now, I will hold onto my pieces and wear them with love and affection as Alec suggested.

reviews.title: VRJ UPDATE 2
text: UPDATE 2:

Last week I went into VRJ in person to take Alec up on an offer he made to me to remediate some terrible customer service I had experienced with them when I first contacted them via email. I met Mina and Alec and had a list of watches I wanted to look at based on their website.
I looked at them all, with Mina being very patient to pull watch after watch after watch. I settled on a few front runners and spoke to Alec to see if we could come to terms.
First the good:
1. Great selection, they have some watches I have never seen before ever!
2. Mina and Alec are pleasant to speak to and pretty forth coming with their views on things.
3. Good knowledge of their watches.
Negatives:
1. My first experience detailed below
2. Pricing is high on most, even when compared to Chrono24 (which tends to already be artificially high).

Overall I felt that VRJ did change my perspective on the service they can give.  I felt I got a fair negotiation that leaned towards the watch I was purchasing as the winner.  The watch I purchased was in great shape and complete with box and papers. I foresee going back in just about every time I am in Toronto but will always be looking at watches which are priced fairly (given their inventory, I think you can always find one if you do your homework and diligence).
I have gone from giving them 1 star based on how I felt treated upon first contact, to 3 given how Alec went out of his way to remediate, to 5 given how happy I am with my current purchase.

reviews.title: Avoid.
text: As others have reviewed on this site, Van Rijk is not recommended. They only want they stay in business is by ripping people off.  The first time I went there they offered my $800 to buy my Rolex Oyster. Cost more to have Rolex tune up the watch.

reviews.title: Not as advertised
text: Not as advertised.  I made an appointment with Mr Van Rijk, accompanied by my son to sell numerous pieces, some family heirlooms.  I  witnessed flippant arrogance and interest only in the meltdown value,  the diamonds were valued like pieces of glass, with bragging that he has so many they are almost worthless. I chose not to sell all the items because of this attitude. It was not a pleasant experience and I was quite disappointed. I would not return.

reviews.title: Nothing but problems with the watch
text: Bought a Rolex in July 2019 and during the first year the watch was taken back 4 times.  Two weeks after I bought the watch,  a link broke and the watch fell on the floor,  the other 3 times the watch would not wind.    Now 2 years later, the watch still doesn’t wind.

reviews.title: Horrible
text: I remember walking into this shop wanting to enquire about getting my platinum diamond engagement ring cleaned.  I opened the door (or was buzzed in, I can't remember).  I saw who I presume was Mr. Van Rijk at the counter and he gave me a look of absolute distain.  Not welcoming in any way shape or form. Terrible! I turned and left. Never again.

reviews.title: Great service, great prices
text: I have purchased several watches from Van Rijk. I find them like family. Very caring, very helpful and full of great ideas for gifts. Prices are fair and the value versus what you pay is a great deal over brand new. Alex the owner and Pina a sales associate are great people. I highly suggest this store to others who look for value in their jeweller. Great place.

reviews.title: Beautiful vintage watch
text: I found this shop on line, and bought this beautiful vintage watch... I called them and Barbara took video for me to show how it looks on the wrist.   I’m very happy when I receive it, because it is well kept and very beautiful... I’m glad I found them... and will continue my treasure hunting with them.

reviews.title: Great Service
text: I was looking for a ruby and diamond ring and I found one I was interested in on Van Rijk’s website. After checking out Van Rijk online I enquired about the ring. Barbara sent me a beautiful video of the ring along with details and pricing as I was unable to visit the shop because of COVID-19 travel restrictions. I purchased the ring and after it was sized I saw another ring on their site that I was interested in. Barbara very kindly and patiently sent me photos of both rings next to each other so I could compare them. While I decided to stay with my original choice Van Rijk was willing for me to change my mind and order the other ring. Long story short I received my beautiful ring via international shipping a few days later and I love it!

reviews.title: Sold a 1968 Vintage Rolex Submariner 5513A
text: Contacted Van Rijk on the advice of a watch collector who is also a friend. Called to schedule an appointment and met with Mr. Van Rijk personally. He spent considerable time to review the watch and appraise its value in an effort to provide me his best price possible. He was very knowledgeable in the area of Rolex.
Having researched the market beforehand, I had an expectation. Mr. Van Rijk purchased my watch for a price that was reasonably within the range of my expectation. I was paid in cash and on the spot.
I encourage anyone interested in selling, or buying estate jewelry for that matter, to consider Van Rijk.
It was a pleasure to deal with Mr. Van Rijk persoanlly, and I highly recommend him.

reviews.title: Totally positive experience
text: I met with Mr. Van Rijk and was received with kindness and integrity.  He combined compassion for my circumstances with a very thorough evaluation of my jewellery. I appreciated the time he took to explain the process of the evaluation, the state of my jewellery and the reason for his final offer.  I felt the money I received was fair and had absolutely no complaints.

reviews.title: Excellent Experience!
text: I want to commend the owner, Barbara Van Rijk, in connection with my recent transaction. I have been looking for a particular Cartier ring (which is no longer manufactured) in a specific size. After months and months of searching on line, I came upon the ring at Van Rijk. All of my my communications were handled directly with Barbara (the owner) and she could not have been more accommodating. The price was very fair and my search is over! Although I have never physically visited their Toronto location, they are a great online resource. Highly satisfied customer!

reviews.title: Totally satisfied !
text: Barbara and Alex are simply wonderful.
Bought a Cartier watch without being present.
Totally trustworthy and professional.
Morrie Dynbort
Hampstead, QC

reviews.title: Very Honest and Professional
text: Sotheby's recommended that I take my a vintage Cartier gold necklace to Van Rijk's, and I  believe they do not carelessly give out recommendations.  I  was treated with utmost politeness and was given a very fair price in comparison with other necklaces in catalogues and internet. Mr. and Mrs. Van Rijk were very professional, honest and were a pleasure to deal with. I would highly recommend them.

reviews.title: Excellent Impression, Fair Price, Personal Attention
text: I visited Van Rijk intending to ascertain the market value of 2 family heirloom (ladies) "mid-century" 18K gold watches, a Patek and a Rolex. Alec van Rijk was most understanding and helpful, explaining the valuation criteria, the condition of the watches, and his shop's services in the selling process. At no time did I feel any "transaction pressure" and he was most generous with his time and explanation details, while knowing that I did not intend to sell the watches right then and there (I was doing the investigation on my wife's behalf). And (after visiting also 2 of his competitors) his valuation was the highest. If/when my wife decides to sell the watches we shall definitely return to van Rijk.

reviews.title: Fair Treatment+Free Education
text: I went to this location to sell some loose diamonds. As well as getting what I believe was a fair price for the stones, I also received an impromptu tutorial. The gentleman that looked after me was very knowledgeable and didn't mind explaining some of the many facets (pun intended) of the diamond trade. At first, the back room had a Guy Ritchie movie feel to it, but I rather enjoyed that and one of the staff quickly joined in the fun after hearing my observation. Everyone was very helpful and courteous which made for a positive experience.

reviews.title: Love my new Rolex
text: I am a young professional and was looking for a new watch that would last me a lifetime. I am very happy with my Rolex - it looks brand new and is great condition (product came with all paperwork and protective covering). I will definitely be retuning to Van Rijk in the future! Thank you.

reviews.title: Great shop
text: Great shop good collection. Received a great deal on a new to me watch.  Great family run business.  Have fun.

reviews.title: Very positive experience selling my unwanted jewellry
text: Alec and Barbara provided the most courteous and best service to me. I had never sold gold or silver jewellery before, and so I was asking a lot of questions and trying to understand the evaluation process. They were very patient in explaining everything to me, even though I was likely taking up more time than they had allotted for my appointment. I highly recommend Van Rijk for evaluating and selling watches or jewellry you no longer want or wear.

reviews.title: Excellent Service & Definitely will come back again
text: I bought 2 Rolex Watches from Van Rijk within a week (1-8 Dec 2018). Because of their provided Excellent services especially Pina was very patient & professional to explain the detail of the watches for me. Also I was so lucky can met the Owner Van Rijk & he was very friendly talked to the customers.
I will introduce my friends go to buy watches or others.  Once again Pina thank you so much.
Alex

reviews.title: Love this place!
text: I have visited Van Rijk many times over the last decade, each time there are many more new items to ogle over. While i have purchased many pieces over the years, i always find that i'm given great, friendly service, and have a nice conversation about the background of the piece i'm buying or that i'm just fascinated with. The selection of Antique and Estate Jewellery is incredible in this place, and as a collector of high-end antique jewellery, I can't wait to visit again! The edwardian platinum brooch i purchased last time is one of my favourite pieces! thank you all!

reviews.title: Van Rijk Jewellers
text: It is such a pleasure to review Van Rijk Jewellers in Toronto for several reasons. First, they have, in my opinion, the finest selection of high end vintage jewelry in Toronto- excellent brands and fantastic pieces! And, their customer service is outstanding. Each and every member of their team is friendly, knowledgeable and kind. Finally, their prices are an excellent value.
You are missing out if you don't stop by this gorgeous store!

reviews.title: Flawless service and amazing selection
text: I am an avid buyer of luxury antique jewelry. Van Rijk's selection is exceptionnal for it's wide choice of unique and unbelievably beautiful high-end estate jewelry! Their pieces are truly timeless and the prices very fair for luxury jewelry. I completed my purchase from another city and the communication through email and over the phone was pleasant. Van rijk makes me look forward to visiting Toronto soon to go see what else they have to offer that isn't online! I just discovered the store and will recommand it without hesitation to friends. I will also shop there again soon for sure (I've got my eye on a few other pieces already!).

reviews.title: Excellent service and vast Omega inventory
text: Purchased an Omega Planet Ocean here recently. Wonderful experience overall. Staff are courteous and respectful, alongside being patient with allowing you to view various different options. I would highly recommend Van Rijk if you are in the market for a quality timepiece at fair prices.

reviews.title: Our Trusted Jeweller
text: We have been customers for many years now.  Have purchased everything from Cartier to Rolexes to diamond rings.  Pina is fabulous! Knowledgeable and entertaining.  Alec is also wonderful.  Never had an issue with security or staff.  Be respectful and Be respected!!

reviews.title: Best vintage selection and knowledgeable attentive sales.
text: A true gem in Toronto .   Alec has a keen eye for vintage watches and has a terrific selection.  Great staff that are happy to answer any questions or concerns you may have.
Worth the trip over just to see the collection.

reviews.title: Sparkling earrings
text: So happy with my trade and purchase. I appreciated the honesty and information about large store bought jewellry. Can't wait to check out other items.

reviews.title: Incredible products and extra-mile service!
text: My husband and I bought a beautiful wedding ring for him and an incredible vintage Victorian necklace for me to wear with my wedding dress. Barbara and Mr. Van Rijk went out of their way to help make the purchase possible for us, offering us a flexible, lower price as we were buying two items. They were so kind, in fact, that when we suddenly needed the ring back earlier than expected from the engraver, Barbara arranged to go pick it up herself days before the delivery was due! We are so happy with our purchases and would highly recommend Van Rijk to anyone in the market for unique jewellery!

reviews.title: I have been dealing with Mr. Van Rijk for over 10 years
text: His knowledge of Watches and Jewelries are excellent.  And his stores have a diverse inventory of Modern and Vintage pieces.  He also gave me a fair price on the watches and jewelries I traded with him.  I am very satisfied with his expertise and honesty.  I will definitely go to his store If I need a vintage watch in the future.

reviews.title: Pleasant Experience
text: We went there to sell a rather large collection of Jewellery. Mr. Van Rijk was a nice and courteous person and patiently evaluated the collection twice. The staff were very polite and overall, we had a very good experience. Definitely will go back to this place and recommend it to friends.

reviews.title: Uncomfortable and snobby
text: So unbelievably rude and snooty. I went with my friend who is a returning customer. They treated him like royalty and barely even looked at me. If this is what buying luxury goods is like, and the people who own them, then I am happy to say I can go my life without needing a $15,000 watch. Honestly, it was one of the most uncomfortable experiences I have had.
The staff needs to treat customers equally, and not look down on people. Would never recommend it.

reviews.title: Great items and great service.
text: Recently purchased an estate automatic watch from Van Rijk Jewellers. I had found them online while searching for a particular brand and model. I purchased then received the watch but it wasn’t keeping its spring power. The shop accepted my return for service as part of the purchase and the watch now keeps perfect time and power. Many thanks in particular to Barbara for her gracious and great service. They kept their word. I would certainly a visit either on the web or better in person.

reviews.title: Professional and courteous
text: Barbara and Alec provided excellent service for my purchase of a watch from the website. Due to COVID-19, I was unable to visit the store and bought it sight unseen. It was exactly as described and delivered as-promised during a very challenging time.

reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
text: Many years ago I bought a Rolex watch in Edmonton.  Once I retired my lifestyle changed and the Rolex was set aside.  This year I saw it and decided to sell it.  I had seen a number of businesses and individuals offering to purchase old gold, jewelry and watches in the Toronto newspapers.  We now have a Toronto Classical radio station rebroadcasting from Collingwood and I had heard Alex Van Rijk advertising regularly.  So I decided to see what he would say about my Rolex. I was somewhat leery when I visited him.  I didn’t know what to expect and wondered if he would try to “low ball” with comments about poor markets, poor demand, etc.  When we sat down ( I had called ahead and made an appointment), he asked about the history of the watch.  He then set to work getting the serial number, and researching the watch, checking it’s condition, etc.  I was very impressed and very pleased with how he conducted his business and how he arrived at what

I considered was a very fair offer for my time piece.  He offered me 3 options for purchasing it, told me what he would sell it for and how much he would profit from the sale.  I found him to be very open and honest and professional.  I highly recommend him.

reviews.title: Law suit
text: This shop is being sued in Toronto for misleading clients on the value of the diamond. They ‘stole’ about 100 percent on top of the value.

reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!!  DO NOT BRING YOUR ITEMS TO VAN RIJK
text: July 2019 I attended at Van Rijk to get 4 items appraised. I met with the owner Alec Van Rijk. During the course of appraising these items, Mr. Van Rijk broke two earrings, ruining one pair entirely. He broke them by rubbing them roughly against a hard slate object in an attempt to determine the quality of the gold. Mr. Van Rijk acknowledged what he had done and offered another pair of earring as a replacement. Given I was at his establishment in order to obtain a valuation of the earrings he had ruined, I had no ability to assess the reasonableness of his replacement offer.  To say I was shocked and angry was an understatement.  Stay away!!!  I have also filed a claim with the Better Business Bureau (#1397910).

text: The most annoying commercials ever.
I turn off the radio every time I hear his voice. Aladdins cave hah

reviews.title: Snotty staff
text: Called to inquire about details of a particular item and the response i got was "read what it says on the website"

reviews.title: Amazing Watch Selection and Excellent Customer Service
text: I purchased a very unique watch from them and had is shipped to the US and then had the opportunity to visit their store in person. They have an amazing selection of watches and at great prices.  Their customer service is top notch and they aim to please.  I collect watches and I will be purchasing more from them in the future.
